mapper.sql: privilegeId, privilegeName, privilegeUrl, privilegeCode, privilegePos, privalegeComm, menuId
mapper.insert: insert into sys_privilege (privilegeId, privilegeName, privilegeUrl, privilegeCode, privilegePos, privalegeComm, menuId) values (#{privilegeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilegeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilegecode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{privilegepos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privalegecomm,jdbcType=BIT}, #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_privilege
privilegeId,
privilegeName,
privilegeUrl,
privilegeCode,
privilegePos,
privalegeComm,
menuId,

mapper.update:
update sys_privilege
privilegeName = #{privilegename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privilegeUrl = #{privilegeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privilegeCode = #{privilegecode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
privilegePos = #{privilegepos,jdbcType=INTEGER},
privalegeComm = #{privalegecomm,jdbcType=BIT},
menuId = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where privilegeId = #{privilegeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_privilege set privilegeName = #{privilegename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privilegeUrl = #{privilegeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privilegeCode = #{privilegecode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, privilegePos = #{privilegepos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, privalegeComm = #{privalegecomm,jdbcType=BIT}, menuId = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where privilegeId = #{privilegeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
